column4: Hey guys. I'm a little not satisfy about my Ubuntu. It's working very slow. I have a Toshiba Satelitte, 3 years old with amd64 thurion. I need to do something else after I install ubuntu on it? Instal video driver etc?
What can be the reason for working so slow? I remember that I had on this leptop, 2 years ago, Debian, and it working preaty OK.
